entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: S 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
